Readme:
Dependencies:  
1. GSL V1.16 (http://www.gnu.org/software/gsl/)
2. Boost Libraries V1.58 (http://www.boost.org) for random number generation 
3. cmake V3.3.2 (https://cmake.org)
4. The misc.dat should be available in the current working directory
description: A Monte-Carlo implementation of diet production in DIS in the correlations limit, based on arXiv:1508.04438
README.md:
# MC_DiJet
# MC implementation to probe the distribution of linearly polarized gluons and elliptic azimuthal anisotropy in DIS dijet production at high energy
